technology: There were no technical difficulties experienced by the participant.
cur_neg_affect: The participant did not express any negative affect about the pandemic in the present.
past_neg_affect: The participant expressed some negative affect about the pandemic when recalling the past, such as having a vacation planned with friends that was cancelled.
communal_orientation: The participant was friendly and asked questions of the conversation partner, but did not build off of the conversation partner's story.
engagement: The participant was engaged in the conversation and genuinely conversed with their partner.
defensiveness: The participant was not at all defensive in justifying their beliefs/perspective.
questions: What's your first interaction or perception regarding COVID-19 and what is how you adapted your work style or lifestyle according to that? [00:06:21]

vaccine_importance: The participant believes that vaccines are extremely important.

general_notes: The participant was very friendly and talkative.
